name: mydrive
tagline: A minimal self-hosted file storage and sharing service
description: myDrive is a self-hosted file storage and sync service with a minimalist web interface. It supports multi-device access, sharing links, and managing files securely without cloud storage.

features.title: Analytics Dashboard
features.description: Visual metrics and usage statistics with customizable charts to track performance and user engagement

features.title: Mobile Responsive
features.description: Responsive design with touch-friendly interfaces and offline sync capabilities for seamless mobile access

features.title: Email Notifications
features.description: Configurable alerts via email, push, or in-app notifications to keep users informed of important updates

features.title: Theme Customization
features.description: Multiple UI themes and layout options with custom branding support to match organizational identity

features.title: Database Backup
features.description: Scheduled backups with encryption and cloud storage integration to ensure data protection and disaster recovery
